description: This file implements placeholder functions for RSA encryption and decryption using the OpenSSL library, specifically for the SSLeay backend. The functions currently do not perform any actual cryptographic operations and return failure status.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoPubSSLeayRSAEncrypt(PVOID pDataToEncrypt,ULONG ulSizeOfData,PVOID pCipherData,PULONG pulSizeOfCipher,PANSC_CRYPTO_PUB_KEY_PARAMS pParams)
methods.description: Placeholder for RSA public key encryption; currently returns failure.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoPubSSLeayRSADecrypt(PVOID pDataToDecrypt,ULONG ulSizeOfData,PVOID pClearData,PULONG pulSizeOfClear,PANSC_CRYPTO_PUB_KEY_PARAMS pParams)
methods.description: Placeholder for RSA public key decryption; currently returns failure.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoPubSSLeayRSAPriEncrypt(PVOID pDataToEncrypt,ULONG ulSizeOfData,PVOID pCipherData,PULONG pulSizeOfCipher,PANSC_CRYPTO_PUB_KEY_PARAMS pParams)
methods.description: Placeholder for RSA private key encryption; currently returns failure.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS AnscCryptoPubSSLeayRSAPubDecrypt(PVOID pDataToDecrypt,ULONG ulSizeOfData,PVOID pClearData,PULONG pulSizeOfClear,PANSC_CRYPTO_PUB_KEY_PARAMS pParams)
methods.description: Placeholder for RSA public key decryption; currently returns failure.
